abstract: CBS's Late Show host Stephen Colbert announces during skits that his alter ego from prior Comedy Central program, in which he played self-obsessed political commentator, cannot be legally reprised again because character remains intellectual property of former network.

headline.print_headline: Stephen Colbert Retires ‘Stephen Colbert.’ Now Welcome ‘Stephen Colbert.’
headline.main: Stephen Colbert Retires ‘Stephen Colbert.’ Please Welcome ‘Stephen Colbert.’

keywords.value: Late Show with Stephen Colbert (TV Program)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: On Thursday, Mr. Colbert – the real one – explained that his revival of a character last week did not play so well with certain “corporate lawyers.”...
lead_paragraph: On Thursday, Mr. Colbert – the real one – explained that his revival of a character last week did not play so well with certain “corporate lawyers.”
